channel.title: DTO
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from DTO, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump pledged to be a 'peacemaker' in the Middle East — now the United States is entering a new war
item.description: Five months ago, President Donald Trump promised to be a peacemaker and a unifier. Tonight, the United States attacked Iran, hitting three nuclear sit...

item.title: U.S. enters war between Israel and Iran
item.description: President Donald Trump said "there are many targets left" in Iran if talks failed to end the war with Israel.

item.title: ‘Unpredictable spillovers’ in markets feared after U.S. launches strikes on Iran
Watch President Donald Trump's address on the U.S. bombing of Iran
item.description: President Donald Trump is set to address the nation Saturday evening after the U.S. attacked Iran, hitting three nuclear sites.

item.title: World leaders react after Trump says U.S. has bombed 3 nuclear sites in Iran, including Fordo
item.description: World leaders reacted to President Donald Trump's announcement Saturday that the U.S. had carried out a "very successful attack" on three nuclear site...

item.title: Why Carnival Cruise Line’s new loyalty program is getting slammed by customers
